title: Online Service-Learning Based Mathematics Professional Ethics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary mathematics education experience and basic professional ethics concepts
context.additional_context: A process for in-service secondary mathematics teachers to cultivate ethical problem-solving skills by participating in service-learning projects in smartphone-centered limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners analyze cases of professional ethics dilemmas in real educational settings and propose solutions
Learners collaboratively complete mathematics education design tasks reflecting community educational needs
Learners explain the relationship between legal responsibility and social impact in ethical decision-making processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
